column4: next questions how can i put the taskbar on the bottom of the screen?
that is a setting that you can change according to your needs
can you find the system settings dialog?
then open your eyes dude, you basically cannot overlook it;)
hmmm :/ i must be blind... u mean just clicking on system settings in the taskbar right? :D

nope, on the right upper corner of your screen there's the button that you normally click when you're looking to shutdown your computer, there is a menu item in there system settings, in there again you can configure unity, and there you have it on the very first page
that opens exactly the same dialogue ...personal, hardware ....
only thing that sounds related to me is appearance but there i can only change the backround and the theme used nothing else
not what i meant, there is a menu item unity, or configure unity or so
